pointOfSale

Class ReceiptPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • pointOfSale.ReceiptPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ReceiptPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Author:
    Stephen Collins, Vanessa Harris, Kolter Bradshaw, Cristhian Ramirez (Date: 4/24/2013) Purpose: Creates a panel which processes, saves and loads the receipts created through TransactionGUI.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addItem(java.lang.String itemPrice, java.lang.String itemName)
      Static method called by the ItemPanel class to add an item to the receiptList.
      static void clearReceipt()
      Removes all elements from the receiptList and resets the total price to zero.
      static void deleteItem()
      Called by the Delete button in the CheckOutPanel class to remove an item from the receiptList.
      private static java.lang.String getTimeStamp()
      Method to retrieve the date and time of checkout for each receipt
      static void loadReceipt(java.lang.String receiptFile)
      Loads items of the selected receipt from text file back into receipt list
      private static java.lang.String manualTab(java.lang.String entry)
      JLists do not recognize the tab character, so this inserts a manual tab that, while not perfect, gets the job done.
      private static void readTax()
      Private helper method which reads the local sales tax amount from a text file and sets a double value equal to it.
      static void saveReceipt()
      Saves the receiptList to text file before clearing it
      private static void updateTotals()
      Updates the total price to include sales tax

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReceiptPanel

        ReceiptPanel()
        Constructs the ReceiptPanel. Sets the initial conditions of the panel and the receiptList JList object. Adds a JScrollPane containing receiptList to this JPanel.

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public static void addItem(java.lang.String itemPrice,
           java.lang.String itemName)
        Static method called by the ItemPanel class to add an item to the receiptList. Also adjusts the subtotals/totals to match the new receiptList elements.
        Parameters:
        itemPrice - (String) Price of user selected item
        itemName - (String) Name of user selected item

      • deleteItem

        public static void deleteItem()
        Called by the Delete button in the CheckOutPanel class to remove an item from the receiptList. Also adjusts the subtotals/totals to match the new receiptList elements.

      • clearReceipt

        public static void clearReceipt()
        Removes all elements from the receiptList and resets the total price to zero.

      • saveReceipt

        public static void saveReceipt()
        Saves the receiptList to text file before clearing it

      • loadReceipt

        public static void loadReceipt(java.lang.String receiptFile)
        Loads items of the selected receipt from text file back into receipt list
        Parameters:
        receiptFile - Text file to be loaded

      • updateTotals

        private static void updateTotals()
        Updates the total price to include sales tax

      • manualTab

        private static java.lang.String manualTab(java.lang.String entry)
        JLists do not recognize the tab character, so this inserts a manual tab that, while not perfect, gets the job done.
        Parameters:
        entry - First character, which the "tab" will follow
        Returns:
        A variable number of blank spaces to act as a tab

      • getTimeStamp

        private static java.lang.String getTimeStamp()
        Method to retrieve the date and time of checkout for each receipt
        Returns:
        returns the current time in String format

      • readTax

        private static void readTax()
        Private helper method which reads the local sales tax amount from a text file and sets a double value equal to it.
